issue.title: [Python][Dev] Remove last dependencies on six
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7846](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7846). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Looks like `six` (the Python 2-3 compatibility library) is still being used and referenced in a couple of places, notably `archery`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7846?focusedCommentId=17036304) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6414
